title: Dead Girls Don't Blog
description: What Would You Do If The Man Who Murdered Your Friend Could Get Paroled?As Katy McKenna struggles to rebuild the career she suspended to chase her cheating was-band's dreams, her life suddenly takes a dramatic turn when she stumbles upon a newspaper story about an impending parole hearing for the man who raped and murdered her high school friend sixteen years ago. Sickened that he could soon be preying on other young girls, Katy throws caution to the wind and sets out to make sure this doesn't happen, not realizing she might not survive to blog about it.Sometimes, doing the right thing can get you killed.
author: Pamela Frost Dennis
